title: Market Update on Technology Stocks - Frontier Communications, Verizon Communications, QUALCOMM, Applied Materials and Xerox
text: Market Update on Technology Stocks - Frontier Communications, Verizon Communications, QUALCOMM, Applied Materials and Xerox  46:51 Market Update on Technology Stocks - Frontier Communications, Verizon Communications, QUALCOMM, Applied... -- NEW YORK, September   <-   NEW YORK , September   ACI Association has initiated research coverage on the following equities: Frontier Communications Corporatio n (NASDAQ: FTR ), Verizon Communications Inc. (NYSE: VZ ), QUALCOMM Incorporated (NASDAQ: QCOM ), Applied Materials, Inc. (NASDAQ: AMAT ), Xerox Corporation (NYSE: XRX ). On Friday, September 18, 2015 , Nasdaq ended at 4,827.23, down 1.36%, DOW declined 1.74% to finish the day at 16,384.58 and the S&P closed at 1,958.03, down 1.62%. Register for your complimentary reports at the links given below. Frontier Communications Corp oration -- Frontier Communications Corp's stock edged lower by 4.04% to close Friday's session at USD 4.99 . The company's shares oscillated between USD 4.98 and USD 5.20 . The stock recorded a trading volume of 28.62 million shares, which was above its 50-day daily average volume of 23.03 million shares and above its 52-week average volume of 16.08 million shares. Over the last three days, Frontier Communications Corp's shares have declined by 6.20%. Moreover, over the last three months, the stock has lost 0.80% and in the past six months, the shares have shed 32.48%. Further, Frontier Communications Corp has a current dividend yield of 8.42%. Sign up and read the free notes on FTR at: http://www.aciassociation.com/FTR.pdf -- Verizon Communications Inc . -- On Friday, the stock of Verizon Communications Inc lost 1.46% to end the session at USD 44.57 . A trading volume of 26.89 million shares was recorded, which was greater than its 150-day daily average volume of 15.17 million shares and above its 52-week average volume of 15.92 million shares. Over the last five days, Verizon Communications Inc's shares have declined by 2.54% and in the past one month, it has lost 6.09%. Further, Verizon Communications Inc has a current dividend yield of 5.07%. The company is trading at a price to earnings ratio of 18.49 and at a price to book ratio of 15.87. This compares to a historical PE ratio of 19.35. The historical PB ratio is near to 15.80. Further, the stock is trading at a price to cash flow ratio of 4.91 and at a price to sales ratio of 1.40. Register for free on ACI Association and access the latest research on VZ at: http://www.aciassociation.com/VZ.pdf -- QUALCOMM Incorporated -- Qualcomm Inc's stock declined 0.96% to finish the session at USD 54.45 . The company's shares fluctuated in the range of USD 54.02 and USD 54.96 and a total of 26.57 million shares exchanged hands during the day. Over the last three days, Qualcomm Inc's shares have declined by 0.77% and in the past one week it has moved down 0.38%. Over the last three months, the stock has lost 18.59% and in the past six months, Qualcomm Inc's shares have shed 22.26%. Further, Qualcomm Inc has a current dividend yield of 3.53%. The company is trading at a price to earnings ratio of 14.96. The price to book ratio stood at 2.59. This compares to a historical PE ratio of 17.06. The historical PB ratio is near to 3.20. Additionally, the stock is trading at a price to sales ratio of 4.14. The complete research on QCOM is available for free at: http://www.aciassociation.com/QCOM.pdf -- Applied Materials Inc . -- Applied Materials Inc's stock slipped 0.56% to end Friday's session at USD 15.93 . The company's shares oscillated between USD 15.73 and USD 16.10 . The stock recorded a trading volume of 24.12 million shares, which was above its 50-day daily average volume of 17.31 million shares. Over the last five days, Applied Materials Inc's shares have advanced 2.77% while in the past one month, it has lost 3.63%. Further, over the last three months, the stock has lost 19.22% and year to date, the company's shares have shed 34.87%. Applied Materials Inc's stock has a current dividend yield of 2.51% and is trading at a price to earnings ratio of 14.89. The historical PE ratio stood at 24.10. Additionally, the stock is trading at a price to cash flow ratio of 10.09 and at a price to sales ratio of 2.00. Free in-depth research on AMAT is available at: http://www.aciassociation.com/AMAT.pdf -- Xerox Corp oration -- Xerox Corp's stock declined 2.17% to close Friday's session at USD 10.35 . The stock recorded a trading volume of 23.70 million shares, which was above its 50-day daily average volume of 13.42 million shares and above its 52-week average volume of 9.28 million shares. Over the last three days, Xerox Corp's shares have declined by 2.17% and in the past one week it has moved down 0.77%. Moreover, in the last six months, the stock has lost 21.47% and year to date, the company's shares have shed 24.31%. Further, the stock is trading at a price to earnings ratio of 18.82 and at a price to book ratio of 1.10. Additionally, the stock is trading at a price to cash flow ratio of 5.00. The price to sales ratio stood at 0.61. The complimentary notes on XRX can be downloaded in PDF format at: http://www.aciassociation.com/XRX.pdf -- About ACI Association: Active Charter Investors Association ("ACI Association") produces regular sponsored and non-sponsored reports, articles, stock market blogs, and popular investment newsletters covering equities listed on NYSE and NASDAQ and micro-cap stocks. ACI Association has two distinct and independent departments. One department produces non-sponsored analyst certified content generally in the form of press releases, articles and reports covering equities listed on NYSE and NASDAQ and the other produces sponsored content (in most cases not reviewed by a registered analyst), which typically consists of compensated investment newsletters, articles and reports covering listed stocks and micro-caps.
